data.name: GM001_Title
data.value: Structs cannot implement INode or IRelationship

data.name: GM001_MessageFormat
data.value: Struct '{0}' cannot implement {1}. Only classes are supported.

data.name: GM001_Description
data.value: INode and IRelationship can only be implemented by classes, not structs.

data.name: GM002_MessageFormat
data.value: Type '{0}' must have a parameterless constructor (public or internal)

data.name: GM002_Description
data.value: Types implementing INode or IRelationship must have a parameterless constructor.

data.name: GM003_Title
data.value: Property must have public getter and setter

data.name: GM003_MessageFormat
data.value: Property '{0}' must have public getter and setter

data.name: GM003_Description
data.value: All properties in INode and IRelationship implementations must have public getters and setters.

data.name: GM004_Description
data.value: Properties can only be of supported types (primitives, string, date/time, Point, collections).

data.name: GM005_MessageFormat
data.value: Property '{0}' of type '{1}' is not a valid complex type for INode implementations

data.name: GM005_Description
data.value: Complex type properties in INode implementations must be classes with parameterless constructors and only simple properties.
